edu.kings.cs233.proxy

Class FlightLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.kings.cs233.proxy.FlightLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class FlightLocator
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    GUI application that records and locates all flights leaving from one airport over the course of a day.
    Version:
    2016-03-18
    Author:
    Kathryn Lavelle

      • add

        private void add(int flight_number,
                 java.lang.String destination,
                 long departure_time,
                 long arrival_time)
        Adds a flight to the data file if there is not already a record with this flight number.
        Parameters:
        flight_number - The flight number.
        destination - The flight destination.
        departure_time - The departure time.
        arrival_time - The arrival time.

      • list

        private void list(int flight_number)
        Finds and displays the flight number, destination, departure time and arrival time for the flight with the given flight number.
        Parameters:

        private void whois(long departure_time)
        Finds and displays flight information and destination for flight departing at given departure time.
        Parameters:
        departure_time - The flight's departure time.

      • getaway

        private void getaway(java.lang.String destination)
